metadata.description: A psychedelic waterfall of colors and patterns ooze down in Stark's signature style. Inspired by the fabric of the universe and the spiritual realm of the natural world. The result is like a psychedelic camouflage, transporting the viewer to an interdimensional plane - Artwork by Jen Stark - Animation by David Lewandowski - Sound by Charlie Scovill - Run time: 36 sec - 2021 - 1/1
metadata.name: Drip Cascade
